dialogue: Yes... 'Remnant'... Is that what they call you?

dialogue.name: What do the stars tell you now

dialogue: Yes, {pl}. A fitting name for one favored by the stars.
We are foreigners to this cursed land, guided here by the five elements, the twelve branches, the ten stems and the nine stars.
We wish to help those in pain, and learn of the true nature of demonkind.
Unfortunately I cannot tell you much else if you are allied with the Blue. I do not see you as an enemy, but you must understand.
They tell me that my fate is in your hands, as I mentioned before. If you wish, I can even read your fortune through them.
Ah... that's quite embarassing, dear {pl}. I tried pleading to the Heavenly King Caliburn on behalf of the people of Kinta and it seemed that I drew his ire.
I didn't wish to sully the Yuan Dao's reputation, so I allowed myself thrown in here as penitence.
As I can only read the intention of the Wandering Stars, I cannot divine every possible outcome and this one was... unforseen.
